F

finalStage() - Static method in class org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage
Final stage will use only the normal version from the base and remove all other information.
fixedStage(String) - Static method in class org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage
Fixed stages will always use pre-release information of the form <stage name>.<incremented count>, where the count is always 1, unless the previous version used the same stage.
floatingStage(String) - Static method in class org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage
Floating stages will behave as a fixed stage if the previous versions stage either doesn't exist or has a lower precedence.
force(String) - Static method in class org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Versioners
Parses the given version and creates a versioner that will always return it.
forScopeAndStage(Scope, Stage, boolean) - Static method in class org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Versioners
